alert.note: Alert for Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 5:36PM CST until March 07 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Current River near Powder Mill affecting Shannon County. Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Jerome. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, flood waters begin to overflow the left bank at the gage site. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:45 PM CST Saturday was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.2 feet on 07/13/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
